Case tracking datasets

Source: vignettes/case_tracking.Rmd
case_tracking.Rmd
library(sars2pack)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)

Compare US datasets

jhu = jhu_us_data() %>% filter(!is.na(county) & subset=='confirmed') %>%
    mutate(fips = county_to_state_fips(fips)) %>%
    group_by(fips,date) %>% summarize(count=sum(count)) %>%
    select(date,fips,count) %>%
    add_incidence_column(incidence_col_name = 'Daily Report',grouping_columns = c('fips'))
covidtracker = covidtracker_data() %>% select(date,fips,positive) %>%
    rename(count='positive') %>%
    add_incidence_column(incidence_col_name = 'Daily Report',grouping_columns = c('fips'))
nytimes = nytimes_state_data() %>%
    filter(subset=='confirmed') %>%
    select(date,fips,count) %>%
    add_incidence_column(incidence_col_name = 'Daily Report',grouping_columns = c('fips'))
fips_to_states = covidtracker_data() %>% select(state,fips) %>%
    unique()
us_states = bind_rows(list(jhu=jhu, covidtracker= covidtracker, nytimes=nytimes),.id='dataset') %>%
    right_join(fips_to_states,by=c('fips'='fips'))
interesting_states = c('PA','CA','GA')
pd = position_dodge(width=0.2)
us_states %>% filter(state %in% interesting_states) %>%
    filter(count>10) %>%
    ggplot(aes(x=date,y=count,color=dataset, alpha=0.8)) +
    facet_grid(rows=vars(state)) + geom_line(position=pd) + scale_y_log10()

us_states %>% filter(state %in% interesting_states) %>%
    filter(`Daily Report`>10) %>%
    ggplot(aes(x=date,y=`Daily Report`,color=dataset, alpha=0.8)) +
    facet_grid(rows=vars(state)) + geom_line(position=pd)
